## Create an Interactive Plot using Plotly Package

### Load Plotly library

```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
```

### Build an Interactive Plot

```{r echo=FALSE}
p <- plot_ly(z = ~volcano, type = "surface")
p
```
